tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE advertising_guidelines (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  platform_name VARCHAR,
  advertising_rules TEXT,
  ethical_standards VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Guidelines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guideline_title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Advertisements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    ad_type VARCHAR(50),
    ad_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE guidelines (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 category VARCHAR,
 description TEXT
 )

CREATE TABLE advertisers (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 email VARCHAR,
 website VARCHAR
 )

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
 )

CREATE TABLE ad_content (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 content TEXT,
 advertiser_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (advertiser_id) REFERENCES advertisers(id)
 )

CREATE TABLE analytics (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT,
 impressions INT,
 clicks INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(id)
 )
